\ TROFAST storage series​ /

Organise your unique storage solution effortlessly

The sturdy frames combine with boxes, trays, and shelves, offering various options in colour, size, and materials. This creates a unique storage solution that perfectly adapts to a child's growing needs.

\ Signature RÅSKOG Trolley​ /

Elevate your space with style and functionality

This trolley fits in the smallest of spaces and can be moved to wherever you need it. Use it as extra storage for all your small items like kitchen utensils, desk accessories, gloves and keys.

\ TJÄRLEK Spring collection​ /

Make your home bloom now

Jump into the season with TJÄRLEK, sprinkle some fun in your home with the collection. Bright colours, vibrant patterns and playful shapes create an instantly uplifting vibe. Enjoy!

\ Nytillverkad collection /

Rediscover our most iconic designs

In Nytillverkad, we get to celebrate some of our favourite designs from the past and update them for a new generation. But some classics never left the stores.

\ TONSTAD bedroom series /

Looking for an oak bedroom furniture?

Its sturdy, classic design creates a timeless, elegant look, often using brushed oak veneer. It offers bed frames with storage, bedside tablesand PAX/TONSTAD wardrobe doors.

\ MITTZON series /

Workspace that feels like your second home

This adaptable furniture range caters to every work style, fostering personal wellbeing and enhancing team collaboration

Fraudulent Recruitment Advertisement Alert: Please be aware that there have been instances of fraudulent recruitment advertisements purporting to represent IKEA. IKEA will not send out any communications, asking for sensitive personal information or any financial information. If you are unsure, please contact us to verify before taking any further action.
